xocs:funding-list.xocs:funding-text: The authors extend their appreciation to the Deanship of Scientific Research at King Khalid University, Saudi Arabia, for funding this work through the research groups program under grant R.G.P.1/207/43. They further thank E. Hitzer, as well as the anonymous referees and the organizers of CGI 2022.

affiliation.ce:source-text: Ecole Normale Supérieure, Moulay Ismail University of Meknès, Meknes, Morocco
Mathematics Department, College of Science, King Khalid University, Abha, Saudi Arabia

head.citation-title: Beurling’s Theorem Associated with Octonion Algebra Valued Signals
head.abstracts: © 2023, The Author(s), under exclusive license to Springer Nature Switzerland AG.The octonion Fourier transform (OFT) is a hypercomplex Fourier transform that extends the quaternion Fourier transform. This paper deals with the generalization of Beurling’s uncertainty principle for octonion-valued signals and on, and therefore extends three uncertainty principles (UP), namely Hardy’s UP, Gelfand–Shilov’s UP, and Cowling–Price’s UP, to the OFT domain.

affiliation.ce:source-text: Ecole Normale Supérieure, Moulay Ismail University of Meknès, Meknes, Morocco
